title: Top Deep Learning Algorithms You Should Know About | Deep Learning Algorithms Explained |Simplilearn
excerpt: Deep Learning algorithms use artificial neural networks to solve complex problems. This video covers the top 10 deep learning algorithms used in the industries. You will learn how these algorithms work and where they can be used. You will also look at the overall view of these neural network structures.
